en.WELCOME_MSG: Welcome to Speech Therapy Practice. Which of the following alphabets do you want to focus on today? {} Please tell me the option number of the letter you'd like to practice.
en.WELCOME_REPROMPT_MSG: Alphabet options are: {} What do you want to practice today?
en.ALPHABET_OPTIONS_REPEAT_MSG: Alphabet options are: {} Please tell me the option number of the letter that you'd like to practice today.
en.PRACTICE_TYPE_MSG: Great! Let's practice letter {}. Do you want to practice with {}?
en.PRACTICE_TYPE_REPROMPT_MSG: What do you want to practice with, {}?
en.NUM_PRACTICES_MSG: Okay! How many {} would you like to practice?
en.CORRECT_NUM_PRACTICES_MSG: Please pick a number less than {}
en.START_SESSION_MSG: You can change the alphabet option or practice type at any point in time. Please tell me when you're ready.
en.TOPIC_MISSING_MSG: What do you want to practice today?
en.QUIT_OR_CONTINUE_MSG: This session is complete. Would you like to practice more or would you like to exit?
en.VALIDATION_CORRECT_USER_SENTENCE: Awesome! That is correct. Say next when you're ready!
en.VALIDATION_INCORRECT_USER_SENTENCE: Not quite! You said {}. Let's try again! Please repeat after me: {}
en.VALIDATION_ALMOST_CORRECT_SENTENCE: Almost there! Let's work on the word {}. Please repeat after me: {}
en.ERROR_MSG: Sorry, I couldn't understand what you said. Can you reformulate?
